text:
[Verse]
Neon dreams in streets tonight
Skyscrapers reaching for the light
Cars zoom by in blurred array
City whispers come what may

[Verse 2]
Sidewalks echo tales of old
Stories told of hearts so bold
Windows shimmer hues of gold
Mysteries that nights unfold

[Chorus]
City lights they glow they shine
In this place where stars align
Every corner life unfolds
In this city dreams are told

[Verse 3]
People rushing in the rain
Chasing moments free from pain
Laughter rings in midnight air
Life is happening everywhere

[Bridge]
Moonlight casts a gentle glow
Through the alleys where we go
Feel the heartbeat of downtown
In this place we won't back down

[Chorus]
City lights they glow they shine
In this place where stars align
Every corner life unfolds
In this city dreams are told
title: City Lights
